item.title: Spain train crash recovery continues as investigators probe 'gap' in rail
item.description: Authorities say the twisted train wreckage makes it difficult to recover people trapped inside.

item.title: Twelve schoolchildren killed after bus collides with lorry in South Africa
item.description: The fatal collision is just the latest in South Africa, where the road safety record is poor.

item.title: China demands Taliban protect its citizens after deadly Kabul blast
item.description: The Islamic State group says they were behind the blast in Kabul, but police say they are still investigating the cause.

item.title: Anthony Joshua's driver appears in court after crash that killed two
item.description: The former heavyweight champion was a passenger in the crash, which killed two of his team members.

item.title: Greenland 'will stay Greenland', former Trump adviser declares
item.description: Donald Trump's former chief economic adviser said the US president's actions are a negotiating tactic.
